Package YAMLParser

Class Lexer

java.lang.Object
YAMLParser.Lexer
public class Lexer
extends java.lang.Object
The lexer is responsible for converting the passed yml in string format into a stream of Tokens. The tokens will contain their spelling, as well as a token type that denote their type.
Author:
jonas.franz

    java.util.List<Token> ymlToTokenStream​(java.util.List<java.lang.String> lines)

    • ymlToTokenStream

      public java.util.List<Token> ymlToTokenStream​(java.util.List<java.lang.String> lines)
      Parses a list of tokens from the given string that represents a flattened YML-File.
      Parameters:
      lines - The contents of the yml file, one string per line
      Returns:
      A list of tokens representing the yml file.
